did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Church of the Holy Family of Auburn records, 1840-1968.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Church of the Holy Family (Auburn, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Marriage, death, baptismal, and confirmation registers; pew rental lists, meeting minutes of the Catholic Institute, church financial accounts, and a history of the church.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The first reel contains marriage registers (1840-185[7], 1851-1868, 1869-1908 and 1908-1937). The second reel contains death registers for 1848-1869, 1869-1878, 1878-1895 and 1944-1968. The third reel contains baptismal registers (1840-1857, 1857-1869, 1869-1905, 1906-1908,1908-1922. The fourth reel contains confirmation registers (1848-1864, 1868-1921), pew rental lists, meeting minutes of the Catholic Institute (1852-1853), church financial accounts (1881-1912), and a history of the church.
